parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: Alarm Cancellation Delay
parameter.description: Additional delay after an alarm has ceased. The parameter allows you to specify additional time, after which the alarm is cancelled once its violation has ceased. !

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Acoustic and visual signals On / Off in case of alarm
parameter.description: parameter allows for LED indicator and acoustic alarm deactivation in case of smoke detection !

options.option: acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active
acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Type of alarm frame sent to 1-st association group (SMOKE)
parameter.description: parameter determines a type of command frame sent by the Sensor in case smoke detection has been detected or cancelled !

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Forced Level of Dimming group 1
parameter.description:
Value of the parameter specifying the forced level of dimming / opening sun blinds when comes 'switch on' / 'open' command to devices from association group no. 1.
In the case of alarm frames the alarm priority is specified. Possible parameter setti !

parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Interval between successive readings of temperature sensors
parameter.description: Interval between successive readings of temperature from all sensors connected to the device in seconds. Note: taking temperature readings from the sensor does not result in sending a temperature condition report to the central hub. !

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Transmitting the alarm or control frame broadcast mode
parameter.description:
Transmitting the alarm or control frame in 'broadcast' mode (i.e. to all devices within range), information sent in this mode is not repeated by the mesh network.
NOTE: If the broadcast mode of information transmission is activated for a given !

options.option: Smoke broadcast mode active, Tamper broadcast mode inactive
Smoke broadcast mode inactive, Tamper broadcast mode active
Smoke and Tamper broadcast mode active

parameter.name: config_73_2
parameter.label: 73: Temperature measurement compensation
parameter.description:
Temperature value to be added to or deducted from the current measured temperature
-1000 0,1°C - 1000 0,1°C !

parameter.name: config_80_1
parameter.label: 80: Z-Wave range test interval
parameter.description:
Time period between the consecutive Z-Wave network range tests.
0 10min[10min-24h] - 17 10min[10min-24h] -> 0 – Z-Wave network range test inactive !

parameter.name: config_82_1
parameter.label: 82: Smoke Sensor sensitivity
parameter.description: There are 3 levels of sensitivity to smoke presence. Level 1 means the highest sensitivity. !

parameter.name: config_83_1
parameter.label: 83: Black Box sensitivity level
parameter.description: Parameter specifies temperature and smoke level after which the Black Box starts recording them. !

parameter.name: config_84_1
parameter.label: 84: Malfunction alarm
parameter.description:
Time interval in which malfuntion alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms.
-126 100ms[100ms-25,5s] - 127 100ms[100ms-25,5s] !

parameter.name: config_85_1
parameter.label: 85: Temperature alarm
parameter.description:
Time interval in which temperature alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms.
-126 100ms[100ms-25,5s] - 127 100ms[100ms-25,5s] -> 5 means 500ms !

parameter.name: config_86_2
parameter.label: 86: Lack of the Z-Wave range alarm
parameter.description:
Time interval in which lack of the Z-Wave network alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms.
1 5s [5s-24h] - 17280 5s [5s-24h] -> 360 means 30min !

parameter.name: config_87_2
parameter.label: 87: Low battery alarm
parameter.description:
Time interval in which low battery alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms.
1 5s [5s-24h] - 17280 5s [5s-24h] -> 360 means 30min !

parameter.name: config_88_1
parameter.label: 88: Temperature measurement compensation for report
parameter.description: Consider temperature measurement compensation (parameter 73) when sending temperature report. !

options.option: Tamper alarm active, with cancellation option available
Tamper alarm active, without cancellation option

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
